mapper.select: select ORG_ID as id, ORG_NAME as name from T_ORG where (ORG_ID = #{city} or PARENT_ID = #{city}) and ORG_TYPE = (select T_CERT_TYPE.ADMIN_LEVEL from T_CERT_TYPE where T_CERT_TYPE.CT_ID = #{certTypeId}) and STATUS=1 order by AREA_CODE

select ORG_ID as id, ORG_NAME as name from T_ORG where (ORG_ID = #{province} or PARENT_ID = #{province}) and ORG_TYPE = (select T_CERT_TYPE.ADMIN_LEVEL from T_CERT_TYPE where T_CERT_TYPE.CT_ID = #{certTypeId}) and STATUS=1 order by AREA_CODE
select o.ORG_ID as id, o.ORG_NAME as name from T_ORG o where o.ORG_TYPE= #{orgType} and o.STATUS = 1 order by o.AREA_CODE
select o.ORG_ID as id, o.ORG_NAME as name from T_ORG o where o.ORG_TYPE= 4 and o.STATUS = 1 order by o.AREA_CODE
select ORG_ID as id, ORG_NAME as name from T_ORG where PARENT_ID = #{parentId}
select o.ORG_ID as id, o.ORG_NAME as name from t_org o where o.parent_id = #{cityId} and o.org_type != 1 and o.status = 1 order by o.area_code
